complete_tasks_to_upgrade: Complete all tasks to upgrade your membership
check_in_task_detail: Check in RewardMe every day to get bonus points.
converter_detail: Convert your rewards easily with one click
missing_receipt_detail: Please provide the detail of the missing email receipt as much as possible.
onboarding01_title:
Earn rewards by
shopping or saving up
onboarding01_detail: Get rewarded for your purchases / MDT staking automatically.
onboarding02_title: The higher your membership tier, the more you earn
onboarding02_detail: Enjoy a higher cash back % when you upgrade your membership.
onboarding03_title: Choose your own cash back rewards
onboarding03_detail: Gift cards, cash, or crypto, it’s your call.
more_merchants_selected: MORE THAN {numberOfMerchant} {merchantCount, plural, =0 {merchant} one {merchant} other {merchants}} SELECTED
linked_emails_detail: It may take some time to analyze your shopping e-receipts. We will notify you once it’s done.
welcome_detail: RewardMe is a cashback app that helps you earn rewards in both cash and crypto from your online purchases.
confirm_select_offer_details: Once you shop in these {number_of_merchants} brands, you will start earning cashback.
edit_prefernece_afterward: You can fill in later from profile page
bind_more_email_later: You can bind more emails later from profile page.
dont_worry: Don’t worry. Our system only detects transactional email receipts, not your personal emails.
we_hope_to_provide: We hope to provide better in-app experience and bring you more offers and redeem options in the future.
we_will_send_otp: We’ll send you a verification code to your phone via text message.
we_have_sent_otp: We have sent a verification code to {phone_number}.
claim_gift_on_birthday: You can claim gift on your birthday
login_in_agree_terms_and_policy: By logging in your email address, you agree to RewardMe’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
setting_up_agree_terms_and_policy: By using the RewardMe service, you agree to RewardMe’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
it_might_take_some_time: It might take some time, we will notify you once it’s done.
turn_on_notifications_to_learn: Turn on notifications to receive news about new rewards, latest promotional events and limited offers.
account_setup_done: Your account has been set up
choose_which_currency_for_cashback: Choose which currency for cash back.
forget_pin_detail: We have to verify your identity before resetting your PIN. We’ll send you a verification code to your phone via text message.
enter_pin_to_verify: Enter the pin again to verify
change_phone_number_detail: Before changing the phone number, we have to verify your identity.
phone_successfully_with_action: You have successfully {action} your phone number.
edit_preference_in_30_days: You can edit your brand preference once every 30 days. You will receive cashback based on your membership level.
choose_more_brand_when_upgrade: You can choose more brands when your membership is upgraded.
get_reward_from_brands: Choose your favorite brands with the special cashback rate.
edited_preference_recently: It seems that you’ve edited the preference recently.
edited_in_30_days: You have edited the preference in recent 30 days. You can edit the preference after {date}.
itMayTakeSomeTimeToAnalyze: It may take some time to analyze your shopping e-receipts. We will notify you once it’s done.
you_will_not_get_any_data_rewards_from: You will not get any data rewards from {name}.
we_partner_with_mailtime: We partner with MailTime to securely link your inbox
we_partner_with_plaid: We partner with Plaid to securely link your card
we_partner_with_planto: We partner with Planto to securely link your card
your_transactional_ereceipts_are: Your transactional e-receipts are securely synced though MailTime
transfer_of_your_information: The transferering of your information is encrypted end-to-end
your_credentials_will_never_be: Your credentials will never be made accessible to RewardMe
this_email_is_already_bound: This email is already bound to an account
we_partner_with_credigo: We partner with CrediGO to securely link your card
referralOgDescription: Earn cashback as you spend with RewardMe!
joinRewardMeWithThisLink: Join RewardMe with this link and earn reward immediately!
you_will_enjoy_pa_percentage: You will enjoy {pa_percentage} in MDT Stake Rewards. It will be credited in ME to your wallet every 7 days.
confirm_upgrade_to_next_level: Are you sure to upgrade your membership to {next_level} level?
staking_interest_rate_percentage_return_: {percentage}% p.a. MDT Stake Rewards Return in New Token*
mdt_available_in_crypto_exchanges: MDT is available in these crypto exchanges
you_can_stake_after_transfer_mdt_to_depo: You can stake MDT after transfering {amount} MDT to the deposit address below.
select_way_to_retrieve_your_shopping_rec: Select which way to retrieve your shopping records
reward_me_needs_your_transaction_records: RewardMe needs your shopping transaction records in order to give your cash back.
invite_friends_to_reward_me: Invite friends to RewardMe. Rewards will be given if they can finish the account setup.
once_your_friend_entered_the_code: Once your friend entered the code and completed the account setup, you and your friend will get {amount}.
cashbackWillBePaidIn: Cashback will be paid in ME coins
refer_number_of_friends: Refer {number, plural, =0 {no friend} one {# friend} other {# friends}}
bind_number_of_accounts: Bind {number, plural, =0 {no email or no card} one {# email or card} other {# emails or cards}}
choose_issue_region: Choose the issue region of your credit/debit card.
enjoy_cashback_detail: As a RewardMe member, you will enjoy cash back automatically on your purchases. Once a new transaction is recorded, your rewards await!
you_earned_first_reward: You Just Earned Your First Reward!
select_number_of_merchants: {number_of_merchants, plural, =0 {select no merchant} one {select # merchant} other {select # merchants}}

Verification failed.
Please enter a new pin again.
error.error_code_100: System Error, Please try again later.
error.error_code_201: User already exist. Please sign in.
